title: Cranberry and pumpkin biscuits
ingredients: ['125g butter, softened', '200g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 egg', '250g tinned pumpkin puree', '300g plain flour', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '100g fresh cranberries, halved', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1 tablespoon orange zest', '75g chopped walnuts']
